bibl.title: The British Museum Expedition to Elkab and Hagr Edfu, 2010.
bibl.note: British Museum Expedition to Elkab and Hagr Edfu, 2001-. - Conservation, epigraphic documentation [1 Greek inscription and Coptic ostraca] and mapping of the open pharaonic tombs.
